vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
γογγύζω,
Ionic dialect [Refs 2nd c.AD+], mutter, murmur, grumble, ἐπί τινι [LXX+NT+3rd c.BC+]
__2 of doves, coo, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]. (Cf. Sanskrit ga[ndot]gūyati 'utter cries of joy'.)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to grumble, complain, mutter
to speak privately and in a low voice, mutter, Jn. 7:32; to utter secret and sullen discontent, express indignant complaint, murmur, grumble, Mt. 20:11; Lk. 5:30; Jn. 6:41, 43, 61; 1Cor. 10:10*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: refunfuñar, quejarse, protestar ; murmurar, mascullar, susurrar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 抱怨, 嘀咕, 咕噥
2) 低語, 耳語 (約 7:32)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 抱怨, 嘀咕, 咕哝
2) 低语, 耳语 (约 7:32)
